[3-13] The mime walks behind a bald elderly man in a gray hoodie and black pants and touches the man's head with his hand. The elderly man feels uncomfortable and touches his head. The elderly man, wearing glasses, turns around and glances at the mime, then turns back and continues to stand with his back to the camera.
